charges.charge_disposition: 10 months confinement each Ct. 1 &; 6 to run concurrently to be served 5 months in custody and 5 months in home confinment; 3 yrs SPR for each Ct 1 &; 6 to run concurrently, supervision to be transferred to North Carolina; $5,100 Restitution; $100 special assessment for each Ct. 1 &; 6 for a total of $200
